archimate:TechnologyService.name: Batch Ingestion Service
archimate:TechnologyService.documentation:
Supervisors are for long-running streaming ingestion (Kafka, Kinesis) while tasks are for once-off ingestion (HDFS, S3)
Submit work https://druid.apache.org/docs/latest/operations/api-reference.html#post-4 POST /druid/indexer/v1/task
What's going on overall? https://druid.apache.org/docs/latest/operations/api-reference.html#tasks GET /druid/indexer/v1/tasks GET /druid/indexer/v1/completeTasks GET /druid/indexer/v1/runningTasks GET /druid/indexer/v1/waitingTasks GET /druid/indexer/v1/pendingTasks
How is one item of work going? https://druid.apache.org/docs/latest/operations/api-reference.html#tasks GET /druid/indexer/v1/task/{taskId}/status
What's it actually working on? https://druid.apache.org/docs/latest/operations/api-reference.html#tasks GET /druid/indexer/v1/task/{taskId}
What was the result of one task? https://druid.apache.org/docs/latest/operations/api-reference.html#tasks GET /druid/indexer/v1/task/{taskId}/report
Cancel work https://druid.apache.org/docs/latest/operations/api-reference.html#post-4 POST /druid/indexer/v1/task/{taskId}/shutdown POST /druid/indexer/v1/datasources/{dataSource}/shutdownAllTasks
Tidy up pending segments https://druid.apache.org/docs/latest/operations/api-reference.html#delete-2 DELETE /druid/indexer/v1/pendingSegments/{dataSource}
